extendedInfo.description: ePSXe for Android is a Playstation emulator (PSX and PSOne). It is a port from the famous ePSXe for PC. ePSXe provides very high compatibility and good speed. It is designed for smartphones and tablets, (for 1-4 players) including a fun 2 players option for tablets using split screen mode.  Include virtual touchscreen pad support, and hardware buttons mapping (Xperia Play, phones with keyboard or gamepad, and external gamepads - bluetooth or USB - such as WiiMote, Sixaxis, Xbox 360, Moga, Ipega...), and analog sticks.ePSXe for Android support OpenGL HD enhanced graphics thanks to Peopsxgl Plugin, see the documentation for configuration info (Menu->Info).ePSXe includes native support for ARM and Intel Atom X86.Games must be provided by user.

reviews.title: AMAZING
reviews.comment: Love the app...works great with my gs3...would love to see a dualshock update to the app...there are games that need it...that would be great to have...
reviews.author: jesuet gonzalez

reviews.title: By far amazing
reviews.comment: Just want to say kodos this app is flawless thus far running ff8. It is very smooth running on my galaxy s4.thanks for making this app.honestly it works better on my phone then the computer.
reviews.author: Justin Kritzer

reviews.title: Runs great on Sony Xperia Tablet Z
reviews.comment: Played several old favorites already ( Command & Conquer, Red Alert, Warcraft II, Diablo, Civ II).  No crashes.  Games running smoothly.  Has tons of useful config options (loved the ability to move the controller buttons so they were all near my thumbs while holding a 10 inch tablet in landscape).
reviews.author: Jeremy Newville

reviews.title: Fantastic compatibility
reviews.comment: Have tried a few different PlayStation apps and have found this has the best compatibility for both downloaded and custom roms. Would benefit from cloud storage for game saves and easy control pad mapping.
reviews.author: Drew Deckard

reviews.title: Awesome and straight-forward!
reviews.comment: Works extremely well on my Snapdragon S4! Only tried FFVIII so far but it works without a hitch. The dev was very helpful and responded quickly through email too :)
reviews.author: Jethro Ray

reviews.title: Great! A+++
reviews.comment: Simple to use & at a very decent price. Worked right away no problems. This was also my first PSx emulator/bios set up. Highly recommended. Works flawlessly with my NYKO Playpad.
reviews.author: Kenn Oz

reviews.title: NVIDIA Shield
reviews.comment: Works quite well on the NVIDIA Shield. Perfect responsiveness, frame-rate and sound.  The only issue is I can\'t bind anything (like L2/R2) to the bottom triggers. Some games need those so it makes it very hard to play them.
reviews.author: Thomas Grimes

reviews.title: Great but...
reviews.comment: It\'s a great emulator but please get rid of the 3 dotted menu in the next update for the HTC One
reviews.author: Ross Sives

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Better than the other psx emu, I never lose my data on my memcards anymore when there\'s an update. Just wish I never bought the other one. Great app!
reviews.author: Aaron Danusis

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I love this emulator and I hope someday add a donation option to this app to support ff8 them and increase the chance of a ps2 emulator from the epsxe team.
reviews.author: Kevin Hicks

reviews.title: I
reviews.comment: I
reviews.author: dylan rothman

reviews.title: Wow!
reviews.comment: You guys pulled this off better than I imagined. Finally contributed for this app after using the pc version since forever ago. If the plugins work I would give 6 stars. Havent tried it yet. Sg4.
reviews.author: Christopher Nelson

reviews.title: Runs games fpse can\'t
reviews.comment: And runs them better. Wish this was out before fpse so I didn\'t have to waste my money. If you only get one psx emulator get this, it has better compatibility, sound, smoothness, than fpse. A lot of Japanese games that did not load on fpse no matter what bios I used, loaded on epsxe.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its okay
reviews.comment: It runs fine on my phone but everything takes up tons of space so i had to delete most of my apps just so i could get tekken 3
reviews.author: Rhett Saldivar

reviews.title: Good missing one feature.
reviews.comment: It would be a great feature to be able to adjust the control.  My 7 year old fingers are small on a 10 in tablet so it makes the control scheme too big and its position cant be change.  Make a control  editor like Super GNES its able to adjust to the user.  Really like the controller skins.  Other than that this app is 4 stars.
reviews.author: Ryan Freman

reviews.title: PS1 games on my phone... awesome
reviews.comment: Great app. Works perfect with ipega pad
reviews.author: Axel Freiria

reviews.title: Excellent emulator
reviews.comment: Playing Final Fantasy VIII. It  feel I have a playstation 1 plug in to tv and bluetoothcontrolle. Awesome playing time.
reviews.author: Bayron Castillo

reviews.title: Smooth now.
reviews.comment: Smooth on my new Sero 7 Pro. Just some sound issues but great to see it running good.
reviews.author: Kenn L

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Easy to setup, great compatibility and best of all, inbuilt support for my iPega bluetooth controller! FPSE has been somewhat screwy after its recent update, so I wholeheartedly recommend this as a better alternative.
reviews.author: Chu Hua Chang

reviews.title: This app is absolutely amazing.
reviews.comment: If you are looking to enjoy PSone games, with an easy to use menu/GUI. Buy it, it is WORTH the money. I didn\'t hesitate to drop my modern games to rekindle my love for FF7-9, and several other RPGs.
reviews.author: Luigi Rosario
